name: Barbed Devil
description: A Barbed Devil is a fiendish creature covered in sharp, spiny protrusions that can pierce through flesh. Its skin is dark reddish-brown, with glowing eyes signifying its intelligence and sadistic nature.
memorable: The Barbed Devil delights in inflicting pain and is particularly dangerous due to its ability to grapple and deal additional piercing damage to foes.
goals: To serve higher-ranking fiends and inflict suffering on its enemies.
relations: Often seen serving more powerful fiends in the infernal hierarchy.
environment: Typically found in infernal realms or locations associated with evil.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison damage, resistance to cold damage, and the ability to grapple effectively.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and has a reliance on maintaining grapple for control.
attacks: Can perform two claw attacks and one tail attack or cast 'Hurl Flame' twice, dealing piercing and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Barbed Hide inflicts piercing damage to creatures grappling or grappled by the devil at the start of its turn.
senses: Possesses true devil's sight enabling it to see through magical darkness.
skills: Skilled in Athletics, Deception, Insight, and Perception, showcasing its versatility.
additional_information: The Barbed Death ability creates hazardous terrain upon its demise.
Magic Resistance gives it advantage on saving throws against spells.
It can communicate telepathically within 120 feet.
